experiences.heading: My Work Experience
experiences.text: I've been working on Frontend Development for the past 2 years. Here's a timeline of my journey

exp1.1: - Teaching students frontend with easy and interactive methods
exp1.2: - Developing self-study with AI and research skills on them to accelerate learning speed
exp1.3: - Working on real projects and improving their knowledge by practice

exp2.1: - Creating modern sites with Next JS and TypeScript to avoid bugs
exp2.2: - Inserting AI Chatbase powered with Chat GPT 4.0 to give information to clients
exp2.3: - Adding Telegram bots and Email JS to websites to create a database of clients
exp2.4: - Using Three.js, antDesign, Swiper, and Aos libraries to make sites more flexible and smooth
exp2.5: - Efficiently managing the team, making sure tasks need to be done on time on Trello

exp3.1: - Using i18next libraries effectively to create multilingual sites
exp3.2: - Creating websites with React JS, deploying on domain and registering on Google console
exp3.3: - Raising performance and SEO over 90% and hoisting up sites to the top on search
